item.title: Margaret add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Margaret add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "What are you?" I rasped. It smiled. "Whatever scares you." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Kim Harrison
item.description: "Making a spell is easy. It's trusting you did it right that's hard." -- Kim Harrison

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Life sucks, and then you die..." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "The world is full of shitheads, Rhea. Don’t listen to them—listen to me. And I know that Lou is one of those shitheads. But I listen." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Sasha White
item.description: "I can say no at any time ” “Yes.” “But aren’t I supposed to do whatever you say ” “Only if you want to. That’s what makes the power exchange of D s so potent. It’s a free exchange one that is meant to give us both what we need." -- Sasha White

item.title: Margaret add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there" -- George Harrison

item.title: Margaret add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "All that I hope to say in books, all that I ever hope to say, is that I love the world." -- E.B. White

item.title: Margaret add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "You can't force love, I realized. It's there or it isn't. If it's not there, you've got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you've got to do whatever it takes to protect the ones you love." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "If your eyes weren't open, you wouldn't know the difference between dreaming and waking." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "There comes a point when you just love someone. Not because they're good, or bad, or anything really. You just love them. It doesn't mean you'll be together forever. It doesn't mean you won't hurt each other. It just mean you love them. Sometimes in spite of who they are, and sometimes because of who they are. And you know that they love you, sometimes because of who you are, and sometimes in spite of it." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life isn't finding shelter in the storm. It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Life is for the living. Death is for the dead. Let life be like music. And death a note unsaid." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "You will lose what you value most, so treasure it while you can." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Sometimes crying or laughing are the only options left, and laughing feels better right now." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Amanda Hocking
item.description: "This is the way the world ends; not with a bang or a whimper, but with zombies breaking down the back door." -- Amanda Hocking

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Margaret add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Sometimes I wonder if there's something wrong with me. Perhaps I've spent too long in the company of my literary romantic heroes, and consequently my ideals and expectations are far too high." -- E.L. James

item.title: Margaret add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "- "Why don't you like to be touched?" - "Because I'm fifty shades of fucked-up, Anastasia" -- E.L. James

item.title: Margaret add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "This is me, Ana. All of me...and I'm all yours. What do I have to do to make you realize that? To make you see that I want you any way I can get you. That I love you." -- E.L. James

item.title: Margaret add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Don’t leave me,” he whispers. “Oh, for crying out loud—no! I am not going to go!” I shout and it’s cathartic. There, I’ve said it. I am not leaving. “Really?” His eyes widen. “What can I do to make you understand I will not run? What can I say?” He gazes at me, revealing his fear and anguish again. He swallows. “There is one thing you can do.” “What?” I snap. “Marry me,” he whispers." -- E.L. James

item.title: Margaret add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I'm anything but fine. I feel like the sun has set and not risen for five days, Ana. I'm in perpetual night here"." -- E.L. James

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "It crosses my mind that Cinna's calm and normal demeanor masks a complete madman." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Margaret add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You have a... remarkable memory." "I remember everything about you. You're the one who wasn't paying attention." -- Suzanne Collins
